mapper.select: SELECT board_id, title, content, views, created_at, updated_at FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{board.title}, content = #{board.content}, updated_at = now() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board SET views = views + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
